DOC.brief_summary: A study of plasmatic concentrations of endothelin-1 (ET1), atrial natriuretic peptide (ANP) and brain natriuretic peptide (BNP) in acute ischemic stroke.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Plasmatic Concentrations of Endothelin-1 (ET1), Atrial Natriuretic Peptide (ANP) and Brain Natriuretic Peptide (BNP) in Acute Ischemic Stroke.
DOC.criteria: male or female age > 18 with an ischemic stroke cardiac failure renal failure
